headline: G-III Apparel Q4 Earnings Beat Estimates, Gross Margin Rises Y/Y
summary: GIII's fiscal fourth-quarter results reflect higher year-over-year sales and earnings. Also, the gross margin expands 260 bps year over year to 39.5%.

raw.headline: G-III Apparel Q4 Earnings Beat Estimates, Gross Margin Rises Y/Y
raw.summary: GIII's fiscal fourth-quarter results reflect higher year-over-year sales and earnings. Also, the gross margin expands 260 bps year over year to 39.5%.

headline: American Eagle Beats on Q4 Earnings, Comparable Sales Rise 3% Y/Y
summary: AEO posts better-than-expected results in fourth-quarter fiscal 2024. Consolidated comparable sales improve 3%.

raw.headline: American Eagle Beats on Q4 Earnings, Comparable Sales Rise 3% Y/Y
raw.summary: AEO posts better-than-expected results in fourth-quarter fiscal 2024. Consolidated comparable sales improve 3%.

headline: UGG Launches New GoldenRise Sandal Featured on HANNI as Spring/Summer 2025 Global Brand Ambassador
summary: SANTA BARBARA, Calif., March 13, 2025--Southern California-based global lifestyle brand UGG® (a division of Deckers Brands [NYSE: DECK]) evolves its sandal offering with the new GoldenRise, a three-in-one platform style. In a Spring/Summer 2025 global campaign fronted by HANNI, the musician returns to be the global face of the brand’s new campaign, which highlights the wearability of the customizable silhouette throughout the ultimate summer day.

raw.headline: UGG Launches New GoldenRise Sandal Featured on HANNI as Spring/Summer 2025 Global Brand Ambassador

headline: Footwear Q4 Earnings: Nike (NYSE:NKE) is the Best in the Biz
summary: Earnings results often indicate what direction a company will take in the months ahead. With Q4 behind us, let’s have a look at Nike (NYSE:NKE) and its peers.
